articles.author: Richard Wood
articles.title: Farmers back open border with Indonesia as foot and mouth fears grow - 9News
articles.description: Australia's peak farming body has backed the federal government's decision to keep the border with Indonesia open, even as fears over our neighbour's foot-and-mouth disease outbreak continue to grow.
